title: explore cycles of rhythms that are public or group party based repetitive to invite the lost into public and semi-private rhthms
author: joshualinog
excerpt: explore cycles of rhythms that are public or group party based repetitive to invite the lost into public and semi-private rhthms
content:
explore cycles of rhythms that are public or group party based repetitive to invite the lost into public and semi-private rhthms

essentially have regular repeating events that you can always invite lost people to, or people of peace to on multiple levels:

public - public grilling? party? public larping? public dnd?

semi public - party at lot? block party? 

semi private - party at house? 

NEW MOON could be a great on ramp for this every month!
